level.text: A licensee licensed under this chapter, an Administrator-in-Training Program (A.I.T.), or a student or graduate authorized to practice nursing home administration pursuant to 17 DCMR § 6211 shall adhere to the standards set forth in the “Code of Ethics” as published by the American College of Health Care Administrators.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 51 DCR 10630 (November 19, 2004); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 13385 (September 27, 2013).
